subject: Hockey, Ice
Stanley Cup
lead_paragraph: After two subpar efforts in Boston last week, Vancouver’s Roberto Luongo stymied the Bruins in a 1-0 win as the Canucks moved within a game of winning the Stanley Cup.
snippet: After two subpar efforts in Boston last week, Vancouver’s Roberto Luongo stymied the Bruins in a 1-0 win as the Canucks moved within a game of winning the Stanley Cup.
